author: InfoMesh Contributors

tools.name: web_search
tools.description: Search the web via InfoMesh P2P search engine. Returns ranked results with optional full content, RAG chunking, and score explanations.

recency_days.description: Filter results within last N days

domain_allowlist.description: Only include results from these domains

fetch_full_content.description: Return full article text per result

chunk_size.description: Chunk size for RAG context splitting

rerank.description: Apply semantic re-ranking via local LLM

tools.name: fetch_page
tools.description: Fetch full extracted text of a URL. Returns cached content or crawls live. Max 100KB.

tools.name: crawl_url
tools.description: Add a URL to the crawl queue and index it. Rate limited to 60 URLs/hour.

force.description: Force re-crawl even if previously crawled

tools.name: fact_check
tools.description: Cross-reference a claim against indexed web content. Returns verdict with supporting/contradicting sources.

tools.name: status
tools.description: Node status: index size, peer count, credit balance, search quota, and analytics.
